trans-unit.source: Defines the credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Definerer policyen legitimasjonen som skal brukes for ressursen forespørsler ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>og de avledede klassene.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Legitimasjonen-policyen angir om du vil sende legitimasjon når du sender en <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>for en nettverksressurs, for eksempel innholdet i en webside.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response that indicates that the client's credentials are required.
trans-unit.target: Hvis legitimasjon sendes kan servere som krever klientgodkjenning forsøke å godkjenne klienten når forespørselen er mottatt i stedet for sending av svar som angir at klientens legitimasjon er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: While this saves a round trip to the server, this performance gain must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network.
trans-unit.target: Når dette lagrer en tur-retur på serveren, må denne ytelse tap være balanced mot sikkerhetsrisiko som er innebygd i sending av legitimasjon i nettverket.

trans-unit.source: When the destination server does not require client authentication, it is best not to send credentials.
trans-unit.target: Når målserveren ikke krever klientgodkjenning, er det best å ikke sende legitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ICredentialPolicy policies are invoked only if the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> or the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ICredentialPolicy policyer startes bare hvis det <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>eller <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>som er forbundet med forespørselen med rettigheter som ikke er `null`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials.
trans-unit.target: Denne policyen har ingen innvirkning på forespørsler som ikke angir legitimasjon.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set an ICredentialPolicy policy.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi en policy for ICredentialPolicy.</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> that handles authentication for the request will invoke the <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> method before performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>som håndterer godkjenning for forespørselen som skal aktivere den <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A>metoden før du utfører godkjenningen.</xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> </xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If the method returns `false`, authentication is not performed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden returnerer `false`, godkjenning utføres ikke.

trans-unit.source: An ICredentialPolicy policy affects all instances of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> with non-null credentials in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: En policy for ICredentialPolicy påvirker alle forekomster av <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>med ikke-null-legitimasjon i gjeldende programdomenet.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests.
trans-unit.target: Policyen kan ikke overstyres på enkelte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the client's credentials are sent with a resource request made using an instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om klientens legitimasjon sendes med en ressursforespørsel ved hjelp av en forekomst av <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>klassen.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: After an <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy> policy has been specified by setting the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> that handles authentication for a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> invokes the ShouldSendCredential method before performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: Etter en <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy>policy er angitt ved å angi den <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen den <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>som håndterer godkjenning for en <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>starter ShouldSendCredential-metoden før du utfører godkjenningen.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy>

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `false`, authentication is not performed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden returnerer `false`, godkjenning utføres ikke.

trans-unit.source: When the original request has been redirected or proxy authentication is required, the resource identified by `challengeUri` can be different from the requested resource that is specified in <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Når den opprinnelige forespørselen har blitt omdirigert eller proxy-godkjenning er nødvendig, ressursen identifisert av `challengeUri` kan være forskjellig fra den forespurte ressursen som er angitt i <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RequestUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the case of redirection, `challengeUri` contains the actual destination <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Når det gjelder omadressering, `challengeUri` inneholder faktiske målet <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If proxy authentication is required, `challengeUri` contains the address of the proxy server that requires client authentication.
trans-unit.target: Hvis proxy-godkjenning kreves, `challengeUri` inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren krever klientgodkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that will receive the request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>som vil bli forespørselen.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> that represents the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>som representerer den forespurte ressursen.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that will be sent with the request if this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>som sendes i forespørselen hvis metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.IAuthenticationModule"></xref> that will conduct the authentication, if authentication is required.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.IAuthenticationModule"> </xref> som vil utføre godkjenning, hvis godkjenning er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the credentials are sent with the request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis legitimasjonen sendes i forespørselen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
